snippet: Prosecutors in Brooklyn are investigating the death of a newborn who was said to have contracted herpes from oral suction, a popular practice in some Jewish communities.
abstract: Brooklyn district attorney's office confirms that it is investigating the death of a newborn from herpes that was caused by oral suction, a controversial procedure used in some circumcisions, predominantly in ultra-Orthodox Jewish communities.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in Brooklyn are investigating the death of a newborn who was said to have contracted herpes from oral suction, a popular practice in some Jewish communities.

headline.seo: Infant’s Death Renews Debate Over Ritual Circumcision
headline.main: Baby’s Death Renews Debate Over a Circumcision Ritual
headline.print_headline: Baby’s Death Renews Debate Over a Circumcision Ritual
